db:abstract.db:para: Legend is part of Qt Chart QML API.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Legend is a graphical object, which displays legend of the chart. Legend state is updated by ChartView, when series have been changed. Legend is used via ChartView class. For example:

Please note that there is no QML API available for modifying legend markers, unlike in the Qt API of Charts. The use case of modifying markers can be implemented for example by creating your own custom legend. For an example on how to do this, see Qml Custom Example application.

db:section.db:title: alignment : Qt.Alignment
db:section.db:para: Legend paints on the defined position in the chart. The following alignments are supported: Qt.AlignTop, Qt.AlignBottom, Qt.AlignLeft, Qt.AlignRight. If you set more than one flag the result is undefined.

db:section.db:title: backgroundVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether the legend background is visible or not.

db:section.db:title: borderColor : color
db:section.db:para: The border color of the legend, i.e. the line color.

db:section.db:title: color : color
db:section.db:para: The color of the legend, i.e. the background (brush) color.

db:section.db:title: font : Font
db:section.db:para: The font of markers used by legend.

db:section.db:title: labelColor : color
db:section.db:para: The color of brush used to draw labels.

db:section.db:title: reverseMarkers : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether reverse order is used for the markers in legend or not. False by default.

db:section.db:title: showToolTips : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether tooltips are shown when the text is truncated. This is false by default. This currently has no effect as there is no support for tooltips in QML.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether the legend is visible or not.
By default, this property is true.
